topic.title: History Of Procedures Organizer - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.62"

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10073)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] procedure (CONF:10077)
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedure
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type x_ActClassDocumentEntryOrganizer
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode with data type ActMood
Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode with data type CS

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10073)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] procedure (CONF:10077)
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedure
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08
